CustomField.formula: IF ( AND ( Account_Owner_Type__c = 'BDR', Account.BDR_Retention_Countdown_Calculation__c < 91, Account.BDR_Retention_Countdown_Calculation__c > 0),'NEW', IF ( AND ( Account_Owner_Type__c = 'BDR', Account.BDR_Retention_Countdown_Calculation__c <= 0), 'RETENTION', IF ( AND ( Account_Owner_Type__c = 'AM', AM_Retention_Countdown_Calculation__c < 366, AM_Retention_Countdown_Calculation__c > 0),'NEW', IF ( AND ( Account_Owner_Type__c = 'AM', AM_Retention_Countdown_Calculation__c <= 0), 'RETENTION',''))))
CustomField.label: Customer Type
